Package ui.game.menu

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.game.menu.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player in the context of the game menu.

      • Player

        public Player​(boolean player2,
              TerminalHandler handler,
              boolean enabled)
        Constructor for Player. Create a new config menu for each type of player.
        Parameters:
        player2 - Boolean; true if the player is player 2.
        handler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - If the config menus are enabled for selection.
